title: Not Understanding My Order
body:
I have sent a support ticket  three days ago, but I was wondering if anyone here could state if the same thing is happing to them, where their order says processing under status.  

Just curious if this order is still finalized or did I do something wrong :(

replies.body:
Merch orders typically take a few *business days* to process before they are shipped. This is is normal, but if it lasts an extraordinary length of time, definitely reach out to player support again about it.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Haven't logged in to see your response!! I did get my ticket answered about processing, I'm just a little worried about when in Oct, my Project hoodie will "ship". I'm reassured by the worker that handled my ticket so I'll just do another ticket it if doesn't come by the end of Oct!

Thanks for responding!

I'm glad to hear you were reassured. Please note that while it should ship this Month, it doesn't mean it will arrive this month. Depending on how far away you are from the warehouse and which carriers the mech is shipping through, it could take a number of days to reach you after it ships.

Let me know if you have any other concerns.

Hello, 
Processing means it's not finalized yet. Player Support will be able to confirm, just need to be patient :)
https://euw.merch.riotgames.com/en/customer-care/faqs
They did!!! Thanks for taking the time to responded with the information I sought!!
